name: UAC Bypass Using Consent and Comctl32 - Process
description: Detects the pattern of UAC Bypass using consent.exe and comctl32.dll (UACMe 22)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.parent.executable:*\\consent.exe AND process.executable:*\\werfault.exe AND winlog.event_data.IntegrityLevel:(High OR System))`
